text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa…… 
All trace of "Pursuers"――Lost.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe wants to be recognized. 
How will you――"Interact" with 『Me』?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
I'm not even sure what it is I want to do. 
But, at the very least, I wanted Neo Universe to understand me.
choice_data_list: <size=38>Who are you, and what do you want to do?</size>
<size=38>Who are you, and what do you want to do?</size>

text_block_list.text:
If I didn't know at least that much, then I 
couldn't help her. Even if she wouldn't reveal her 
true identity, I wanted to at least know her goal.

What do I……want to do……? 
Neo Universe wants――to "Actualize".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: To do that, I must understand myself……and then――"Emulate"?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
……It seemed like there was something she wanted to do, but I had 
no clue what she meant. Was it difficult to put in to words?
First, I'd like to――"Converse" with you.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
At the very least, I understood those words. 
Neo Universe was seeking an interaction between us.

Which meant……we would have to understand each 
other. I decided to take her to see places she 
probably had never seen outside of school.
First, to a Ramen shop.
To・Kotsu……Rameeen……Raaamen……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
So it's……『Food』. 
I've never had it before, but……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
It seemed like the concept of food was something she was 
familiar with. After starting with the basics, next was……
This is……a "Sanctuary"?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: A place to observe――various creatures――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
When seeing 『Cute』, Neo Universe 
feels bliss……In other words, 『Excited』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Affirmative. ――[Like].
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Seems like we were gradually beginning to understand each other. 
She was even able to show me something like a slight smile.
Today……『Fun』 was experienced.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
I was able to make more progress than I expected. 
Her words have become easier to understand, so now……

Maybe I could get a clearer answer about 
what she was, and what she wanted to do.
Excuse me, Uni-san? You're Uni-san right?!
At that moment, another Uma Musume came running up to us.

I thought so! I happened to see you running earlier. 
It's me, Zenno Rob Roy. The librarian.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Zenno……Rob Roy……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
I'm "Familiar"……with that existence. 
I'm indebted to you, it seems.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Yes, of course! 
After all, Uni-san is……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: A student at Tracen Academy, after all!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I finally got my first bit of information about 
this mysterious girl in front of me. Neo Universe 
was an Uma Musume from Tracen Academy……
choice_data_list: <size=38>I've never seen her wearing the uniform……</size>

text_block_list.text: Uniform……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: This is also……in my "possession"……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Seeing her like that, I was convinced. In the end, 
Neo Universe was just an ordinary Tracen Academy student……

No, she wasn't ordinary. Her behavior was too eccentric for that. 
Just what kind of Uma Musume was she?
choice_data_list: <size=38>Rob Roy, do you know anything about her?</size>

text_block_list.text:
About Uni-san is it? 
Yes, Uni-san is……
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
A slightly mysterious Uma Musume……She uses a lot of difficult 
words……so in class, she ends up alone a lot of the time.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
But……I've spoken to her on several occasions. Since I'm the 
librarian, and Uni-san spends a lot of time in the library.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Uni-san……Umm. I've spoken with you a lot, but today was 
the first time I've seen you run. How should I say it……?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
It was a……spectacular run! It's a different kind 
of run than the hero I admire, but it displayed 
a high level of awareness! I guess you could say.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Especially……that spurt on the last straight! 
It was wonderful. Slipping through that gap without 
hesitation. It was almost like you disappeared……!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
It was like she disappeared. Which means, as expected, 
she didn't actually disappear. Which means……

Neo Universe was just an Uma Musume with a slightly peculiar 
personality. I guess I was just overthinking things.

But, there were still several other things that 
were on my mind. I still didn't know what Neo 
Universe wanted to do. And on top of that――

That day――that encounter on the roof. If she hadn't come 
from the sky, just how did she get on the locked roof?
Trainer-san, is something wrong?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
choice_data_list: <size=37>There was one thing I was curious about……</size>
<size=37>There was one thing I was curious about……</size>

text_block_list.text:
But maybe this topic was……better to 
discuss in private between the two of us.
choice_data_list: <size=43>Neo Universe, can you come with me?</size>
<size=43>Neo Universe, can you come with me?</size>

text_block_list.text:
After parting ways with Zenno Rob Roy, 
the two of us headed towards a particular place.

――The roof at night. 
The place I had made first contact with Neo Universe.
That day, how did Neo Universe get on to the roof?
……"MUTX".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
……it was "MUTX". 
Neo Universe's……first……
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Another fragmented word. But I was somehow able to 
figure it out. Perhaps, on that day, Neo Universe was……

Seems like that was the case. Even if Neo Universe herself 
couldn't unlock the door, there were plenty of people that could.
Right, for example……
